name: Glam Metal Monster Hunter Beta Rules
name_original: Glam Metal Monster Hunter Beta Rules
description:
It's 1987 and the world shakes to the sounds of Motley Crue, Bon Jovi and Van Halen.

But the neon bright lights of the Sunset Strip cast Dark Shadows.  Shadows filled with sinister evil forces.

Glam Metal Monster Hunter is a micro role playing gaming where players taken on the role of hard travelling, fast living musicians standing tall against the forces of the darkness.

This game is a Beta Test, last updated Feb 2020.
